original: @10a * // stong pa la gnas snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: stong ba la gnas snying rje bdag nyid can

original: zhing na bzhugs pa'i thabs dang shes rab tshogs //
analyzed: zhing na bzhugs ba thabs dang shes rab tshogs

original: gzugs brnyan lta bur shes par bya //
analyzed: gzugs rnyan lta bur shes ba byed

original: snying rje'i ro yis tha dad rtsod pa spangs //
analyzed: snying rje ro yis tha dad rtsod ba spong

original: der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams bza' //
analyzed: der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams bza

original: shin tu rnam dag stong pa'i chang ni btung //
analyzed: shin tu rnam dag stong ba chang ni thung

original: skye 'gro skal ldan rnams la don 'di bstan //
analyzed: skye gro skal ldan rnams la don di ston

original: skal med rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya //
analyzed: skal med rnams la shin tu gsang ba byed

original: rnam thar byug pas phyi nang brlan byas la //
analyzed: rnam thar byug ba phyi nang brlan byed la

original: yul gyi longs spyod la ni ci bder spyad //
analyzed: yul gyi longs spyod la ni ci bder spyod

original: phan tshun 'gro dang 'ong ba'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: phan tshun gro dang ng ba chos rnams la

original: dag dang ma dag yid la mi bya'o //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag yid la mi byed

original: byang chub sems kyi phreng bas rnam brgyan la //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi phreng ba rnam rgyan la

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug bya ste //
analyzed: gsang ba dkyil khor nang du jug byed ste

original: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba rgyun mi chad

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i g-yung mo mo spang ngo //
analyzed: lhan cig skye ba g-yung mo mo spong ngo

original: klu sgrub kyi glu rdzogs so//
